text: The Bends is an album by the band Radiohead. It was released in April 1995. ==Track listing== All songs written by Radiohead. #"Planet Telex" – 4:19 #"The Bends" – 4:06 #"High and Dry" – 4:17 #"Fake Plastic Trees" – 4:50 #"Bones" – 3:09 #"(Nice Dream)" – 3:53 #"Just" – 3:54 #"My Iron Lung" – 4:36 #"Bullet Proof..I Wish I Was" – 3:28 #"Black Star" – 4:07 #"Sulk" – 3:42 #"Street Spirit (Fade Out)" – 4:12 ==References== Category:1995 albums Category:Radiohead albums
title: The Bends
